name: Room n°167
description:
Room n°167

Can the root be better than the branch?
They're both part of the same being.
One goes down. One goes up.
They're both the same part of being.
Of being what?
Of being a man.
Of being a woman.
Of being a rose.
Of being a rock.
Of being a tree.
Of being everything and nothing.

No, there's much more than that.
There's always an end. But it's never the end.
Because beings just happen to have ends.
Like roots being the lower end of a tree.
And branches being the upper end of a tree.

Growing endings.

As long as they are alive.

e
